mapper.sql: id, person_name, person_sex, person_hobby, person_address, person_sign, person_explanin, person_work, person_tel, person_qq, person_tx, person_others, user_id, is_used
mapper.select:
select
from person_info where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and is_used = 1

select
from person_info where user_id = #{userId} and is_used = 1
select p.*,u.login_name,u.phone,u.email from person_info p,users u where 1=1 and p.user_id=u.id and p.user_id = #{userId} and p.is_used=1 and u.is_used = 1
